text: - Resilience and determination,
it is a hallmark of my life.
At one point in my life, I was sentenced
to 30 years in prison.

Anybody sentenced to 30
years in prison at my age,
it's equivocal to a life sentence.
I didn't allow it to beat me down.
Instead, I started digging.
I started looking for a way

that I can turn a
negativity into positive.

I discovered myself doing
art and creating artwork.
I would actually paint pictures
of me, where I want to go.
This is who I am.
I was always looking forward, even going
through a tough situation.
Even going through a dark time,

I would actually paint
my way out of prison.

In 2017, I wrote down
a declaration that said

that I'll be home 10 years
before my release date.

I wrote down a plan. I wrote
down systematic thoughts.
How am I going to make this happen?

Four years later, I came home
because I executed a plan.
I was very inquisitive when I came home

and I discovered AWS Educate,
just looking for education.

And I know that coming from
prison I needed something

and I needed something
that wasn't expensive.
And come to find out I got it for free.
So I got my start with Intro to GenAI.

It was a phenomenal start.
It sparked a fire in me.

And from there I took
a ton of other classes.

From that badge that I
got from Intro to GenAI,
it was something that I needed.
After all that I've been through,
to get to this point and get a badge,

I don't know, I was like
a kid in a candy store.
Like, "Wow, look what I got."
Don't get me wrong.

When I was going through what
I was going through in prison,
you have doubts.
You have certain things that make you feel
that you're worthless.

And getting that spark again
from AWS Educate, I felt
that I was worth something.

My brother, he said all the
time, "Brother, you inspire me.

You can do it. Like to see you
go through what you're going

through with your resilience,
and to be positive

and to do all the things
that you're doing."
I'm excited about the future.

Learning AI, learning AR,
doing the cybersecurity.
I'm so excited about learning
and being a continuous learner.
I want to own my own company.

I want to go on and help people
build their own companies.

I want to educate my community.
I want to just love people.

I just... That's it. Just
share my love to other people,
to the world.
